sections.name: Skeletal Hulk
sections.text: Huge giants and other enormous creatures make powerful skeletons.

sections.name: Skeleton
Skeleton Abilities
Creating Skeletons
sections.text: Start with a skeleton of the appropriate size. (Gargantuan skeletons can use skeletal hulk with the elite adjustments, Gargantuan size, and 5 feet more reach.) Add Strikes, Speeds, or other abilities it would gain from its shape. For instance, a chimera skeleton might have a horn attack with its goat head and jaw attacks with its dragon and lion heads, but not a fist attack.

sections.name: Unlife Without Flesh
sections.text: The necromantic energies that infuse animated undead skeletons give them the ability to see without eyes and move without muscles. Despite being mindless, skeletons' instinct to do evil comes from their corrupt vital essence, perverting void energy for creation rather than destruction.

Most skeletons have one of these abilities. If you give a skeleton more, you might want to increase its level and adjust its statistics.  
  
 **Bloody** A coating of blood gives the skeleton fast healing equal to its level.  
 **Collapse** [@] **Trigger** The skeleton is critically hit; **Effect** The skeleton collapses into a pile of bones and the attack deals only normal damage. The skeleton can re-form in a standing position as an action, but until it does, it is immobilized and off-guard.  
 **Explosive Death** When the skeleton is destroyed, its bones shatter and explode. Adjacent creatures take 1d6 slashing damage per 2 levels (minimum 1d6) with a basic Reflex save against the moderate spell DC for the skeleton's level.  
  
 **Screaming Skull** [##] (auditory, emotion, fear, mental) The skeleton removes its skull and throws it, making a jaws attack with a range of 20 feet. It then attempts to Demoralize each foe within 10 feet of the target. The head bounces, rolls, or even flies back, returning to the skeleton at the start of its next turn. The skeleton is blind until then.

links.name: moderate spell DC for the skeleton's level
links.alt: moderate spell DC for the skeleton's level

sections.text: Animated skeletons are among the most common types of undead.

traits.name: Mindless
traits.text: A mindless creature has either programmed or rudimentary mental attributes. Most, if not all, of their mental attribute modifiers are –5. They are immune to all mental effects.

traits.name: Skeleton
traits.text: This undead is made by animating a dead creature's skeleton with void energy.

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with void energy and soul-corrupting unholy magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by vitality energy and are healed by void energy, and don’t benefit from healing vitality effects.

traits.name: Unholy
traits.text: Effects with the unholy trait are tied to powerful magical forces of cruelty and sin. They often have stronger effects on holy creatures. Creatures with this trait are strongly devoted to unholy causes, and often have weakness to holy. If a creature with weakness to unholy uses an unholy item or effect, it takes damage from its weakness.

universal_monster_ability.name: Void Healing
universal_monster_ability.text: A creature with void healing draws health from void energy rather than vitality energy. It is damaged by vitality damage and is not healed by healing vitality effects. It does not take void damage, and it is healed by void effects that heal undead.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: This weapon can be used to attack enemies up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent enemies. For creatures with reach, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

ability.name: Broad Swipe
ability.text: As skeletal giant, but with its claw Strike.

ability.name: Massive Rush
ability.text: The hulk Strides and makes a claw Strike with a +4 circumstance bonus to damage. If the Strike hits, the hulk automatically pushes the target 10 feet.
